title: Toast messages staying on screen 3-4 mins factory reset, got a refurbished 3 XL still bad?
content: The white toast pop up messages, that normally only last a few seconds, are staying on my screen now 3 to 4 minutes. Did a complete factory reinstall, reset, nothing changed, got a refurbished phone from google, nada change these messages BLOCK the bottom of the phone, they're in the way of the keyboard for typing, there in the way of everything, they are nightmare, had no problems until upgrading to Android 10 ‚òπÔ∏èüëé
